item.title: United has made changes to the MileagePlus rules
item.description: Starting March 1, 2015, United Airlines will transition its MileagePlus program to a revenue-based model. Instead of earning miles based on flight distance, members will earn miles based on ticket price and MileagePlus status. [Image of the United Airlines logo] The new system calculates earned miles using the base fare, carrier-imposed surcharges, and the member’s MileagePlus status.
